title: Mind-body interventions
cleaned_text: interventions is the precise name of a [U.S. National Center for Complementary and Alternative Medicine](/index.php/U.S._National_Center_for_Complementary_and_Alternative_Medicine) (NCCAM) classification that covers a variety of techniques designed to enhance the mind's capacity to affect bodily function and symptoms. Mind-Body Interventions use a variety of techniques designed to enhance the mind's capacity to affect bodily function and symptoms. Some of these techniques that were once considered to be [complementary or alternative medicine](/index.php/Alternative_medicine) but have now become mainstream (for example, [patient support groups](/index.php?title=Patient_support_group&action=edit&redlink=1) and [cognitive-behavioral therapy](/index.php/Cognitive-behavioral_therapy)).
